On Mon, 22 October, 2007 5:22 pm, ovisual12 wrote:
> My name is Vince and I am looking for a reliable solution to testing
> EJB's. I have came across various tools including XJB, EJBUnit,
> Embedded Jboss, Cactus, etc..
>
> I am just wondering which solution is the most mature and most supported
> by the community. I need to be able to mock up JNDI so that I can test
> the persistance in my EJB's.
>
> I would like to test outside the container as I hear this is the best
> method for testing EJBs. Can anyone give me some suggestions and point me
> in the right direction. Any help would be greatly appreciate, a tutorial
> anything that will help get me started. I would preferable like a
> solution that can fit into a night build and test enviornment. We use
> Continuum to build and test our companies code everynight. If I could
> drive the EJB test cases from a Maven pom that would be a bonus.
>
> Thanks in advance,
>
> Vince
